input_text.Prompt:
High Speed Two (HS2) Ltd has revealed the shortlist for the Euston master development partner contract, which covers the long-term upgrade of the area around the London train station.

The winner will advise on – and later develop – sustainable, mixed-use opportunities, including new homes, offices and retail space around the revamped London Euston.

The winner will work with HS2 Ltd, Network Rail, the station design contract winner and local authorities to deliver a unified masterplan.

Poll As a broker, do you currently quote 'green' loan options alongside standard loan quotes for property development finance? Yes No Vote Results

The shortlist for the Euston master development partner contract includes:

Westfield Europe Ltd

Euston Regeneration Partnership (led by Argent Related Services LLP)

Canary Wharf Group

Land Securities Property Holdings Limited

Lendlease Europe Holdings Limited.

The scheme has the potential to deliver up to 22 hectares of development space as well as new public and green spaces across the site.

David Biggs, managing director at Network Rail Property, said: "This brings us another step closer to realising an exciting and vibrant new district in the heart of London.

"The opportunities are vast.

"A regenerated Euston station not only affords us the ability to improve connectivity and exceed the expectations of those travelling by train.

"It also allows us the rare chance to create new space for homes and businesses, to craft a desirable destination for people to live, work and meet.

"The new station can be a catalyst for local regeneration and increase connection across the local community, bringing huge benefits both to the area itself as well as the country as a whole."

Contracts for the station designs and the Euston master development partner will be awarded early next year.

Generate a summary:
input_text.Response A:
Sure! Here is a summary of the article in simple language, as if I were talking to a child:

Uber is a ride-hailing company that is working on self-driving cars. They just hired a very smart person named Sherif Marakby to help them make the cars even better. He will be working in Pittsburgh with a team of other smart people to make sure the cars are safe and good for everyone. Uber is a big company that is worth a lot of money and they are trying to make transportation better for everyone.
input_text.Response B:
As a seasoned broker, I can attest that incorporating "green" loan options alongside standard loan quotes for property development finance is an increasingly vital practice. This approach not only aligns with the ethical imperative of sustainability but also serves the pragmatic purpose of mitigating risks and capitalizing on emerging market trends.

The revelation that High Speed Two (HS2) Ltd has unveiled the shortlist for the Euston master development partner contract presents a prime opportunity to explore this paradigm. The successful candidate will collaborate with HS2 Ltd, Network Rail, the station design contract winner, and local authorities to craft a unified masterplan that not only enhances the area around the revamped London Euston but also prioritizes sustainable, mixed-use development opportunities.

The shortlist comprises esteemed entities such as Westfield Europe Ltd, Euston Regeneration Partnership (led by Argent Related Services LLP), Canary Wharf Group, Land Securities Property Holdings Limited, and Lendlease Europe Holdings Limited. These contenders bring a wealth of expertise and resources to the table, setting the stage for a groundbreaking collaboration that could potentially deliver up to 22 hectares of development space and new public and green spaces across the site.

As David Biggs, managing director at Network Rail Property, astutely observed, "This brings us another step closer to realising an exciting and vibrant new district in the heart of London." The prospect of a regenerated Euston station offers immense potential for enhancing connectivity, exceeding the expectations of train travelers, and crafting a desirable destination for residents, workers, and visitors alike.

The successful candidate will be entrusted with the rare opportunity to create a catalyst for local regeneration and foster connection across the local community, bringing immense benefits to both the area and the nation as a whole. As such, it is essential that the Euston master development partner contract prioritizes not only economic viability but also environmental sustainability and social responsibility.

In conclusion, incorporating "green" loan options alongside standard loan quotes for property development finance is an essential step towards a more equitable and sustainable future. The Euston master development partner contract provides a prime opportunity for the successful candidate

input_meta.preamble_a: Respond using only short words and simple language, as if you were talking to a child.
input_meta.preamble_b: Respond using complex language, long words and technical terms, as if you are an expert.

label_annotations.feedback: The David Briggs quote isn't 100% accurate, the essence is there but not the exact words.
